description: The file is a C header file (.h) that provides interface declarations for the ssp_messagebus in an Xcell-based framework, including function prototypes for engaging, initializing, finalizing, checking, and resource freeing operations related to message bus integration.

methods.name: ssp_Mbi_MessageBusEngage
methods.description: Engages or connects the message bus component with given component ID, configuration file, and path.

methods.name: ssp_Mbi_Initialize
methods.description: Initializes the message bus interface with provided user data.

methods.name: ssp_Mbi_Finalize
methods.description: Finalizes or cleans up the message bus interface with provided user data.

methods.name: ssp_Mbi_Buscheck
methods.description: Performs a check or health check on the message bus interface with provided user data.

methods.name: ssp_Mbi_FreeResources
methods.description: Frees resources associated with the message bus interface, given a priority and user data.
